title: Vegan mulligatawny soup
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 carrot, chopped', '1 medium potato, peeled and chopped', '1 cooking apple, peeled and chopped', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 teaspoon tamarind paste', '1 tablespoon curry powder, to taste', '1L vegetable stock', '300ml tomato juice']
